name: Call of Snipers - Sniper Squad
description:
Call of Snipers - Sniper Squad is an amazing fighting game in which you experience the most epic adventure of rescuing country from the evil plan of terrorists.
Features:
- Ultimate HD graphics.
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Realistic war Sound effects
- Warfare and Combat Visual Effects
- Integrated sniper controls.
- Complete Military Base Settlements.
